title: Blooming Dance! Dance!
description: Blooming Dance! Dance! is a bonus CD sung by Kinako Sakurakoji, Mei Yoneme, Shiki Wakana, and Natsumi Onitsuka. The song is featured in Love Live! Superstar!! TV Anime Season 2 Blu-ray 5, which is included in the limited edition version of the fifth Blu-ray release. It was released on January 27, 2023.

infobox.Artist: Kinako Sakurakoji, Mei Yoneme, Shiki Wakana & Natsumi Onitsuka
infobox.Label: Lantis
